thread.title: Cyberjaya College Kuching diploma equips students to become medical assistants, provides real clinical experience

title: Cyberjaya College Kuching diploma equips students to become medical assistants, provides real clinical experience
text:
KUALA LUMPUR (Sept 18): Medical assistants play a crucial role in Malaysia s healthcare system, supporting doctors and nurses in clinical examinations, medical procedures, record-keeping, and community outreach. In Sarawak, the demand for trained medical assistants is especially pressing in rural areas where access to healthcare remains limited. Deputy Premier as well as Minister of Public [...]
The post Cyberjaya College Kuching diploma equips students to become medical assistants, provides real clinical experience appeared first on Borneo Post Online.
